submission.narrative_summary: Diversion of escrowed sale proceeds owed to N & S Holding LLC (Florida Land Trust No. 2763-196). Despite written direction to pay the beneficiary, the title agent wired funds to an attorney IOTA escrow (Zeig Law Firm PLLC, City National Bank of Florida) on 2023-01-11. Indicators include contradiction of closing instructions, lack of 1099-S to beneficiary, internal references to a never-executed 'future transaction', and unresolved funds consistent with layering typologies in real-estate money laundering.

filing_information.contact_office: N & S Holding LLC - AML Surveillance Unit

transactions.notes: Routing inconsistent with escrow instructions; suspected layering/structuring.

suspicious_activity.narrative: IC3 Submission ID 7065f60922b948a59af3a8654edb16dd. Funds originated from Zeig IOTA Escrow, routed through pass-through accounts #2304977980 and #2000043165557, and dispersed to YBH Holdings LLC, Eisenstein Buyers, and layered offshore accounts. Dollar amounts and UETR identifiers pending subpoena from Banesco USA.

indicators: Wire disbursement contradicted written closing/beneficiary instructions (land-trust).
Use of attorney IOTA escrow (City National Bank of Florida) to park sale proceeds owed to beneficiary.
Lack of 1099-S issuance to true beneficiary of sale proceeds.
Internal reference to a non-executed 'future transaction' used to justify diversion.
Funds not returned or reconciled after request; absence of corrective disbursement.
Layering typology: escrow → attorney trust → related/shell entities → subsequent acquisition.
Round-dollar and structured transfers observed in related account activity (monitoring list).
Active/inactive twin LLC patterns (YBH 2948/341) suggesting SPV rotation for title/finance.

authority_scope: Recognized for regulatory submissions to FBI, FinCEN, IRS, DoD, DDTC, and international counterparts.
Authorized to coordinate with FBI, FinCEN, IRS, DoD, and international regulatory partners for investigative actions.
Holds first-tier subcontractor authority under the U.S. federal contracting framework per FAR 52.209-7 and FAR 52.204-10.
SAM.gov registration active for N & S Holding FL LLC with no exclusions or debarments.
capabilities: Apply for and manage federal assistance projects with institutional, managerial, and financial controls.
Deploy AI-driven investigative systems supporting FBI IC3, FinCEN, and IRS engagements.
Execute AML and UCC enforcement actions including liens, constructive trusts, and fund tracing.
Coordinate cross-border compliance activities aligned with U.S. and international regulatory frameworks.
Produce AI-assisted summaries and records suitable for SARs, UCC filings, and court exhibits.
statutes: Program Fraud Civil Remedies Act (31 U.S.C. § 3801)
Mandatory disclosures under 2 C.F.R. § 200.113 and policy requirements under § 200.300

law_enforcement_contacts.requested_action: Initiate rapid asset freeze/trace; coordinate with receiving bank (City National Bank of Florida) and originating bank (Banesco USA) referencing 2023-01-11 $206,693.68 wire and OBI '22S-213 SELLER PROCEEDS 2763 NW 196 TERR'.

law_enforcement_contacts.reference: This dataset reflects the SAR narrative supplement and exhibits.
law_enforcement_contacts.requested_action: Flag related parties and accounts; share with appropriate task force partners under 314(b)/(a) as applicable.

law_enforcement_contacts.reference: Related 3949-A supplement planned; cross-reference to IC3 Submission ID above.
law_enforcement_contacts.requested_action: Parallel financial tracing for potential tax evasion, unreported proceeds, and nominee structures.

instructions: When Banesco USA or City National Bank of Florida responds, request complete transaction histories for every customer tied to the diverted escrow proceeds, not only the identified escrow accounts.
Seek customer due diligence files, signature cards, authorized signers, disbursement approvals, and any internal compliance alerts associated with those customers.
If any identifiers, amounts, or narrative fields are missing from the response, issue immediate follow-up questions that enumerate the outstanding data points.

institutions.name: Banesco USA
focus_accounts: D/XXXXXX6842 (Nu World Title of Sunset LLC escrow)
questions: Provide all incoming and outgoing transfers for customers connected to Florida Land Trust No. 2763-196 for the 90 days surrounding 2023-01-11.
Share KYC, beneficial ownership, and compliance review notes for Nu World Title of Sunset LLC and any affiliated escrow accounts.
institutions.escalation_note: Escalate to compliance if KYC packages or account statements are withheld.

institutions.name: City National Bank of Florida
focus_accounts: Account #2304977980 (Zeig Law Firm PLLC IOTA escrow)
questions: Request complete client ledgers identifying all beneficiaries of the IOTA account for the month of January 2023.
Obtain SWIFT/ACH logs for funds leaving the IOTA account that relate to the diverted escrow amount and any connected customers.
institutions.escalation_note: If client ledger entries omit counterparties, insist on supplemental reporting before closing the inquiry.

bank_follow_up.reminder: Continue questioning until bank responses provide every requested data point; document each follow-up in the case log.

IC3 tracking ID 7065f60922b948a59af3a8654edb16dd matches the SAR narrative supplement and annex attachment.
Sharon Topaz empowered as Managing Partner for N & S Holding LLC with UEI QD5XW4H6MNX8 and CAGE 87AY0 per affidavit.
